tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ContentDistribution (
  platform_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  platform_name VARCHAR,
  audience_demographics JSON,
  engagement_metrics JSON
)

CREATE TABLE PlatformData (
    platform_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    platform_name VARCHAR(255),
    content_type VARCHAR(50),
    content_id INT,
    distribution_channel VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE AudienceDemographics (
    audience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    platform_id INT,
    gender VARCHAR(10),
    age_group VARCHAR(20),
    location VARCHAR(100),
    FOREIGN KEY (platform_id) REFERENCES PlatformData(platform_id)
);

CREATE TABLE audience_demographics (
  audience_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  platform_id INT,
  audience_age INT,
  audience_gender VARCHAR(10),
  FOREIGN KEY (platform_id) REFERENCES platforms(platform_id)
);

CREATE TABLE engagement_metrics (
  engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  platform_id INT,
  audience_id INT,
  views INT,
  likes INT,
  shares INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (platform_id) REFERENCES platforms(platform_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (audience_id) REFERENCES audience_demographics(audience_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Content (
    content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    content_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    platform_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (platform_id) REFERENCES Platforms(platform_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Metrics (
    metrics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    content_id INT,
    audience_id INT,
    views INT,
    likes INT,
    shares INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (content_id) REFERENCES Content(content_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (audience_id) REFERENCES Audience(audience_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Content (
  content_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  content_title VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  content_type VARCHAR(50),
  platform_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (platform_id) REFERENCES Platform(platform_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Engagement (
  engagement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  content_id INT,
  audience_id INT,
  views INT,
  likes INT,
  comments INT,
  shares INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (content_id) REFERENCES Content(content_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (audience_id) REFERENCES Audience(audience_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Metrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  metric_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  content_id INT,
  metric_value INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (content_id) REFERENCES Content(content_id)
);
